00082  public static function CreateICal($start, $end, $summary, $description, $company, $uid = false) {
00083   if($uid === false)
00084    $uid = md5(date('Ymd') . date('His'));
00085    
00086   $c = "BEGIN:VCALENDAR\n";
00087   $c .= "VERSION:2.0\n";
00088   $c .= "PRODID:-//$company//NONSGML $company//EN\n";
00089   $c .= "METHOD:REQUEST\n"; // requied by Outlook
00090   $c .= "BEGIN:VEVENT\n";
00091   $c .= "UID:$uid\n"; // required by Outlook
00092   $c .= "DTSTAMP:" . date('Ymd') . 'T' . date('His') . "\n"; // required by Outlook
00093   $c .= "DTSTART:$start\n";
00094   $c .= "DTEND:$end\n";
00095   $c .= "SUMMARY:$summary\n";
00096   $c .= "DESCRIPTION:$description\n";
00097   $c .= "END:VEVENT\n";
00098   $c .= "END:VCALENDAR\n";
00099   
00100   return $c;
00101  }
